name: swarm

effect.sword_shield: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
